mapper.insert: INSERT INTO book ( book.title, book.isbn, book.price, book.publicationDate, book.introduction, book.size, book.author, book.press) VALUES ( #{book.title}, #{book.isbn}, #{book.price}, #{book.publicationDate}, #{book.introduction}, #{book.size}, #{book.author}, #{book.press});
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM book WHERE isbn = #{isbn} LIMIT 1;
